entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 12:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times mixed with wet snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near the water overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northwest 40 gusting to 60 near the water in the morning. Wind becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
